description:
Mid-height, run-specific socks with mesh zones to keep feet comfortable as you pick up the pace. Thin and cushionless, they fit in close-fitting shoes without sacrificing sensitivity.

  • Made of soft merino and synthetic blend
  • 4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place
  • Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for comfort
  • Shred Shield™ reinforced toe cap adds durability
  • Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear
  • Narrower profile is designed to fit those with narrower feet
name: Smartwool Run Zero Cushion Mid Crew Socks - Women's
